values:
Linde and Manna had a baby boy. Love Metal, the new record since DS&BH will be released overseas on April 12. The new single, Funeral of Hearts is all over the radio and tv overseas. 

Daniel Lioneye briefly will tour the US. The only date i know so far is New York's CBGB on April 4. But that's because I booked it.
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/3067.html

Aside from the singles collection to be released... BMG Finland is releasing a sampler on 7" vinyl of rarities and live cuts. Your Sweet 666 acoustic, Beautiful rock version and Right Here In My Arms orchestra version will be on it, plus live tracks from tavastia on New Years Eve and from the Rockpalast festival.
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/2629.html

Ville and Linde were in Philadelphia for the CKY4 Preview Party hosted by Bam Margera. Nobody really knew who they were... Linde cut his hair and Ville grew his sideburns....

That's all for now...
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/2447.html
Sorry about the lack of news, but the way the HIM news has been going... no news is good news...
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/2226.html
To all you lucky HER teamers, the first round of packages were sent out today containing a bunch of stickers and cd singles for Join Me. To join the Her team, contact holmes at JFRC
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/1858.html

Embarrasing HIM stuff.

They always drink before, during, and after their concerts. 
When they are drunk they always walk barefoot. 
When they are drunk they dance with lamps on their heads. 
The play games like: one person gets drunk and gets locked in a closet. He just sits there for a long time. Then they change.
Ville hardly eats anything on tour.
Linde has a massive phobia of women.
Ville has a huge ego.
Burton tries to be the new Zoltan, but everyone liked Zoltan better, so now he cries at night. Every night.

Ok, that was fun, now time for the news:

First off, I just want to say that I probably won't be updating full time because it's really hard to relay news from Finland to America and then double-check.

"Join Me" was played twice, late last night on New York's 92.3 K-Rock Radio. They didn't say anythign about the band, but any publicity is good publicity.

Ville, Mige and Linde are coming to New York on Sept. 2 to do a few interviews about the American album. Yet to be titled, it's gonna be a "greatest hits" with three new songs, two rare songs (probably Stigmata Diaboli and Borrellus) and a bonus cd of videos and live performances.

Thats all for now.
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/1560.html

Lets have some particapatory fun. 

Whats your ideal HIM setlist?

Here's mine:
Stigmata Diaboli
Heartache Every Moment
Resurrection
RHIMA
Your Sweet 666
Gone With The Sin
In Love and Lonely
Borrelus
Razorblade Kiss
Wicked Game
Death Is In Love With Us
When Love and Death Embrace
For You
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/1366.html

Ville has really short hair now. Well, not that short, but short. The video for Right Here In My Arms has been on heavy rotation on the Much Music channel and on MTV2. They list the performer as being HIM, but that will probably be changed as HIM makes the official announcement of their name change on their official website. Also, if your in California, be sure to watch the show Visions of the Dead, where HIM is played constantly. 666 Ways To Love: Prologue is going to be re-released by mailorder only for heartagram club members soon.
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/1115.html

HIM was signed in Finland by BMG, G.U.N. and Supersonic records, so as you may know, HIM needed an American label. 

They signed to Jimmy Franks Recording Company (founded by The Bloodhound Gang's Jimmy Pop) not too long ago. 

Because of another band in America named HIM, Valo and the crew decided to change their name to HER. 

The single for 'Join Me' was released to radio stations the other day.
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/946.html
Oh, and I will only add you as a friend if you add me.
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/523.html
Yay! New journal. This will be all HIM related news, pictures, and random shit for the common ElJay user.
http://yoursweet666.livejournal.com/486.html
